characterDescription:
The prince of Tashikk is ostensibly the ruler of that country. He is referenced minimally - and never by name - throughout the novella, Edgedancer.
When Hauka asks Nale for his papers, she exclaims that she's never before heard of the title, " ... special operative of the prince," to which Nale replies that it is " ... an ancient but rarely used designation."
Shortly thereafter, to a shopkeeper, Nale claims that he is a special deputized operative, granted free jurisdiction throughout the kingdom by the prince.
Much later, Ghenna reports that, with regard to the Everstorm, the prince is reportedly preparing a diktat of emergency for the entire country.
Still later, a guard flings open a door to a room in the Grand Indicium in which are Lift and Wyndle to announce the following:
